title: Power Point Clicker Presentation Remote Control Pen Corporate Gifting || MICEkart.com

headings.text: Power Point Clicker Presentation Remote Control Pen
© 2024 AstrikaInfotech.com . All rights reserved. Privacy Policy

paragraphs:
This Presenter is equipped with top-grade microchip, up to 100 meters wireless range. 
The mini USB receiver supports plug and play technology.
Made of nickel plating metal dome and silicone keypad which  brings you  a comfortable touch feeling. 
Auto standby and deep sleep functions for energy-saving.
Avoids unwanted power consumption when you put it in your bag.
Page up, page down, play slides, black screen functions  for PowerPoint presentation.
Support hyperlinks. 
Operating frequency :  2.4G RF.

Long range 2.4GHz wireless technology provides true freedom for effective presentation.
Remotely controls your power point presentations from up to 15 meters of distance.
Built in Laser pointer to highlight key points in your presentation.
No hassle set up; simply plug into your computer's USB Port.
Compatible with Windows Laptops, Netbooks and Desktop computers.
Preset RF connection without the need for a software driver enables true plug and play capability
